name: mcp-dynamic-orchestrator
description: Dynamic discovery and code-mode execution for MCP servers with progressive disclosure
author: Claude Skills Maintainers

comments.dependencies: This skill uses only Node.js built-in modules (node:fs, node:path, node:child_process, node:vm, node:crypto). No external dependencies required.
comments.node_version: Requires Node.js 18+ for fetch API support (used in HTTP transport)
comments.runtime: Designed to run within Claude Code's plugin system. Tool wrappers in scripts/ export functions that are called by Claude Code.
comments.mcp_servers: MCPs are external processes spawned via npx/uvx. They are not dependencies of this package.
comments.security: Sandbox execution is disabled by default. Set MCP_ORCH_ENABLE_SANDBOX=1 to enable (not secure for untrusted code).
